title: Carl Sandburg Home National Historic Site: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases        March 1, 2016 Agricultural Lease Available In order to maintain the historic scenery at the Sandburg Home and to provide hay for the dairy goats, a five-year agricultural lease is available.  25 acres are available.  Any hay over 300 square bales is retained by the lessee. May 28, 2014 Sandburg Home Volunteer Groups Receive Regional Award The FRESH (Flat Rock Exceptional Sandburg Helpers) and NRCV (Natural Resource Conservation Volunteers) received the National Park Service's Southeast Region 2013 George and Helen Hartzog Award for Outstanding Volunteer Service. November 1, 2011 Living with bears in western North Carolina The North Carolina Wildlife Resources Commission will make a presentation to discuss how we can all be great bear neighbors in Western North Carolina. Learn more about black bears from Great Smokies National Park.
